title: See, touch, feel (TEFC)
brief_description: Artists-in-residence at high schools in Pennsylvania, Minnesota and Colorado demonstrate and discuss their methods of teaching young people. An innovative educational program which placed contemporary artists in the schools, provides an insight into the teaching-learning process as well as into the development of creativity. Featuring artists Mac Fisher, Don Coen and Charles Huntington.
